Docs.param: The operations group for this extension method.
The name of the tag to create.
Docs.summary: Creates a tag in the subscription.
Docs.remarks: The tag name can have a maximum of 512 characters and is case insensitive. Tag names created by Azure have prefixes of microsoft, azure, or windows. You cannot create tags with one of these prefixes.
